Hopelessness and feeling helpless can be a symptom of depression, substance abuse or other mental health issues. It is important to consider the root cause of this feeling and explore available treatment options.
Common medical reasons for nausea include digestive problems, motion sickness, morning sickness, food poisoning, and side effects of medications.
